# Toy Example

Submodel 1

$$
\theta \sim \text{Beta}(a, b) \\
Y_1 \sim \text{Bin}(m, \theta)
$$
Submodel 2

$$
\theta \sim \text{Beta}(c, d) \\
Y_2 \sim \text{Geo}(\theta)
$$
```{r}
n1 <- 10
n2 <- 10

m <- 30

a <- 5
b <- 10

c <- 4
d <- 6

theta <- 0.55

y1 <- rbinom(n1, m, theta)
y2 <- rgeom(n2, theta)
```
